original_text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded him; and the assembly was gathered together unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께서 자기에게 명령하신 대로 하매 회중이 회막 문에 모인지라

sentences.original_text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded him
and the assembly was gathered together
unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
